text: Nabiyow cus, kaqba Sinaamah gacsimeynay kulli gambik cajjii kee Qumraay tawaaf kee Salaatah yamaaten Arac kee Sinaamah Amaanah yan Arac tet Abnem, Sinaamak Nabii Ibraahim maqhaam (Nabii Ibraahim kaqb√¢ xisneh elle Soolak Suge xaa kinnuk) elle Salattan Aracah haysita inne tawaafak tamurruqen waqdi, Nabii Ibraahim kee kay Baxa Nabii Ismaaqil farrimneeh Amrisneh, Yi-Qari umman numtin-wellittee kee Najaasoosik tawaaf kee iqtikaaf kaal Aba maraa kee Salaatah Rukuuquuy Sujuuduh kaal gaca marah kaa Saytunnoysa iyyaanamah
